channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- ipa
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- ipa

item.title: CVE-2020-1722|2024-08-04T06:46:30.371Z -- red%20hat -- ipa
item.description: A flaw was found in all ipa versions 4.x.x through 4.8.0. When sending a very long password (>= 1,000,000 characters) to the server, the password hashing process could exhaust memory and CPU leading to a denial of service and the website becoming unresponsive. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to system availability.
